link.title: Proxmox GUI access with Tailscale VPN

entry.summary: Objective I wanted to be able to access my Proxmox Home Lab from outside my home. However I am super paranoid about exposing anything to the open internet, especially when I have only a bit of firewall setup experience. This meant I would not set up port-forwarding on my router and SSH into my machine via WAN. From research, the only real option left was a VPN.
